item.title: Projects
item.description: Most of projects I’m working on as a developer are still under NDA, but I enjoy building open-source tools in my spare time. Here is a small list of them. Also, you can follow me on GitHub or stalk my activity on Gitstalk. Open Source Projects Unity Now â†’ â–² Zeit Now plugin for Unity. Deploy WebGL builds with ease. item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Gleb ðŸ‘‹ I’m very passionate about game development. Worked at many projects of different scale as a developer, manager, and advisor. I am still working on this website, more content is coming soon ðŸ˜¸ Background I am very passionate about game and software development. Worked at many indie projects of different scale as a developer, manager, and advisor. At the age of 16 started my career at GameInsight as a game developer working on mobile and AR games, but quit after two years to found my own company - Dragonglass.
